{{item.type}}







import {Component, Input, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {Item} from "../../model/item"; import {ActivatedRoute} from "@angular/router"; import {Location} from "@angular/common"; import {ItemService} from "../../service/item.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-items-details', templateUrl: './item-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./item-details.component.css'] }) export class ItemDetailsComponent implements OnInit { @Input() item?: Item; constructor( private route: ActivatedRoute, private itemService: ItemService, private location: Location ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getItem(); } private getItem() { const id = Number(this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('id')); this.itemService.getItemById(id) .subscribe(item => this.item = item); } goBack() { this.location.back(); } }
